Articles.Content: Whenever I try to launch a vehicle it will let me, but as soon as I revert to the VAB It deletes the vehicle that I'm working on and when I try to reload it  there are none of my saved vehicles (Recent or old) and I can no longer launch so I have to restart my game. I don't think its my PC because Its quite new and has good enough specs to qualify for the 'recommended'  performance specs.

I also have started experiencing this bug after about 12 hours of playtime on the same campaign. I have not yet tried starting a new campaign to try to resolve it, but that will be my next step, I think.
Just had this happen as well.  Windows 10 - i7-8700K CPU -- Nvidia 2080 GPU

58 minutes ago, JimJamsE said:

Whenever I try to launch a vehicle it will let me, but as soon as I revert to the VAB It deletes the vehicle that I'm working on and when I try to reload it  there are none of my saved vehicles (Recent or old) and I can no longer launch so I have to restart my game. I don't think its my PC because Its quite new and has good enough specs to qualify for the 'recommended'  performance specs.

Reload a quicksave from before you reverted and they will come back
